document.full_text: at&t inc  has promised to give deutsche telekom  $6 billion in assets, services and cash as a break-up fee if u.s. regulators reject its proposed $39 billion purchase of the german company's t-mobile usa, according to sources familiar with the matter.
document.title: at&t,t-mobile usa break-up is $6 billion: sources
lines_and_colors: at&t inc  has promised to give deutsche telekom  $6 billion in assets, services and cash as a break-up fee if u.s. regulators reject its proposed $39 billion purchase of the german company's t-mobile usa, according to sources familiar with the matter.
